DOC.brief_summary: This study test safety efficacy AAE581 increase Lumbar Spine bone mineral density ( BMD ) 12 month , Dexa-scan ( DXA ) postmenopausal woman osteoporosis .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy AAE581 Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis
